hints.title: Exponential KL-Convergence via Mean-Field Analysis
hints.content:
21: :label: thm-meanfield-kl-convergence-hybrid
22: 
23: **Hypotheses**: Same as Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-main-kl-convergence` in [10_kl_convergence.md](10_kl_convergence.md):
24: 
25: 1. $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave (Axiom 3.5)
26: 2. Parameters satisfy Foster-Lyapunov conditions
27: 3. Noise variance satisfies $\delta^2 > \delta_{\min}^2$ (favorable regime)
28: 
29: **Conclusion**:
30: 
31: The discrete-time Markov chain $S_{t+1} = \Psi_{\text{total}}(S_t) := (\Psi_{\text{kin}}(\tau) \circ \Psi_{\text{clone}})(S_t)$ satisfies:
32: 
33: $$
34: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi_{\text{QSD}}) \leq e^{-t/C_{\text{LSI}}} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi_{\text{QSD}})
35: $$
36: 
37: where the LSI constant is:
38: 
39: $$
40: C_{\text{LSI}} = O\left(\frac{1}{\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}}\right)
41: $$
42: 
43: with:
44: - $\alpha_{\text{kin}} = O(\gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}})$ from kinetic operator

23: **Hypotheses**: Same as Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-main-kl-convergence` in [10_kl_convergence.md](10_kl_convergence.md):
24: 
25: 1. $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave (Axiom 3.5)
26: 2. Parameters satisfy Foster-Lyapunov conditions
27: 3. Noise variance satisfies $\delta^2 > \delta_{\min}^2$ (favorable regime)
28: 
29: **Conclusion**:
30: 
31: The discrete-time Markov chain $S_{t+1} = \Psi_{\text{total}}(S_t) := (\Psi_{\text{kin}}(\tau) \circ \Psi_{\text{clone}})(S_t)$ satisfies:
32: 
33: $$
34: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi_{\text{QSD}}) \leq e^{-t/C_{\text{LSI}}} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi_{\text{QSD}})
35: $$
36: 
37: where the LSI constant is:
38: 
39: $$
40: C_{\text{LSI}} = O\left(\frac{1}{\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}}\right)
41: $$
42: 
43: with:
44: - $\alpha_{\text{kin}} = O(\gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}})$ from kinetic operator
45: - $\beta_{\text{clone}} = \frac{\lambda_{\text{clone}}}{m_a} \lambda_{\text{corr}} \lambda_{\text{Poin}} (1 - \epsilon_{\text{ratio}})$ from mean-field cloning analysis
